colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES MGON DKAR YID BZHN NOR BU'I TSOGS MCHOD BYA TSUL DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM 'DREN RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO'I GSOL DPON @009A *, ,DPYOD LDAN RJES DRUNG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG ^ YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,)
